unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Buying Lunch: One But Not the Other
question_text: On any given day, the probability that Angelo will buy lunch is $0.40$ while the probability that Ben will buy lunch is $0.35$ . If the probability that neither boy will buy lunch is $0.40$ , what is the probability that Ben will buy lunch but Angelo will not?
